name: The Dream Machine 2
description:
The Dream Machine is an interactive science fiction game. 

You are invited to a tech company to test out a top-secret machine that transforms you into a world of dreams. However, there is a small bug in this machine, which is if you die three times in your dreams, you die for real and lose the game. 

There are several branches and endings to this game, can you make the right choices to see the end?   Or will your fate be sealed by your fears?  Play and see which branch you are led to.
